name: Purple Chevron Zippy Pouch
description:
Charger cords, Hair ties, makeup, pencils, granola bars - corral them all in a zippy pouch.  Everyone needs one to organize her stuff.  Maybe even several.  It can also venture out on its own as a cute wristlet to hold your phone, cash and lipstick out on the town.
The zippered opening measures 8" across, and the pouch is 5" tall with a 1 1/4" gusset at the bottom.  The handle is made from natural colored cotton/linen blend fabric and can be removed.  
Awesome purple chevrons are accented with a bright orange zipper.  This pouch is lined in natural twill.
Make a gift set! A matching notepad is available separately.

The zippered opening measures 8" across, and the pouch is 5" tall with a 1 1/4" gusset at the bottom.  The self-fabric handle can be removed.  
Modern blue and white floral fabric is accented with either a bright green or hot pink zipper.
Made a sweet gift set!  A matching notepad is available separately.

name: Aqua Linen Bow Wristlet
description:
A wristlet is your perfect on-the-town companion, with enough room for some cash, a lipstick and your phone.  The detachable strap gives you options - carry it securely on your wrist while you're out and about or go strapless for a nice little makeup bag or pencil case.  The case measures 8" across the bottom and is 5" high.  The strap is 6" long with plenty of room to fit almost any wrist and can easily attach to your keys to give them a handy handle.
This wristlet is made with a beautiful aqua linen that has a lovely golden sheen and features a jaunty self-fabric bow.  It is fully lined in a coordinating aqua scroll print.

name: Dots on Blue Notepad
description:
Finally - a place to keep all those random thoughts and little bits of paper that collect over the course of a day.  Keep your grocery list and coupons all in one place, or carry this stylish notepad into your next meeting.  With a spot for a 5x8 notepad and a pen (both included) this handy companion has two pockets to stash business cards, coupons, pictures, stamps, even a calculator.  The cover is made with a natural linen/cotton blend and the wood button and stretchy loop closure can accomodate everything you stuff into it.  Spill a little coffee on it? No worries - it can be spot cleaned or thrown right into the washer with only a little touch up ironing required.
This notepad is made with a cute blue polka-dot print and is lined in durable natural ticking.

name: Fold-Over Bow Clutch in Metallic Aqua Linen
description: Gorgeous aqua blue linen overlayed with a golden sheen and a self-fabric bow make this clutch a beautiful statement piece.  Sized to fit everything you might need for an evening out, this clutch features a 9" brass zipper and a hidden magnetic snap to keep it neatly folded over when tucked under your arm.  It measures 6 1/2 inches tall by 10 inches wide when folded and extends to 11 3/4 inches when fully opened up.  This clutch is fully lined in natural linen.

name: Vintage Floral Large Pleated Bag
description:
Some days you need to pack it all up and go - this is the bag to take along!  Roomy on the inside, but still sleek enough to fit nicely under your arm, this bag will hold kid stuff, your stuff, your husband's stuff and whatever else you pick up along the way.  It will accomodate an 11" laptop and a binder.  It has two interior pockets for your phone and sunnies and a pen slip, just in case.  This bag measures 15" across the top, 20" across the bottom and is 16" deep.  The 23" straps have a 14" drop.  It closes up with a strong magnetic snap.  Spot cleaning is the recommended first line of dirt defense, but this bag may be machine washed on the gentle cycle if things get really messy.
This bag features a super bright green and purple vintage decor-weight floral print and is lined with a purple linen-cotton blend.  It is accented with a sweet purple rolled flower pin which is fully removable.

description:

Spot cleaning is the recommended first line of dirt defense, but this bag may be machine washed on the gentle cycle if things get really messy.
This bag is created from a gorgeous Amy Butler Soul Blossoms fabric in beautiful tones of mint green, bright green and brown.  It is lined with brown quilted cotton which lends some nice stability to the bag.  It features a removable flower pin created from the same beautiful fabric for some extra pizzaz.

name: Gift Certificate
description: Can't quite decide what she'd like? Let her choose! To purchase a gift certificate click on link "Buy Gift Certificate" below. You will be taken to the PAYPAL site for Pattibags Online Gift Certificates. You may to choose the denomination and delivery method.
